Rule.Name: Class field names should use the 'm_' and 'g_' suffixes.
Rule.Description: Instance fields in classes should begin with the 'm_' prefix. Static fields in classes should begin with the 'g_' prefix.

Rule.Name: Externally visible members should have doc comments
Rule.Description: Since externally visible members comprise your published API, they should be documented using doc comments in the source code.

Rule.Name: String resources should be spelled correctly
Rule.Description: String resources should be spelled correctly.
Rule.Resolution: Check the spelling of the word '{0}'.

Rule.Name: Remove all empty methods and properties
Rule.Description: Empty methods and properties should be commented or removed.
Rule.Resolution: All empty methods, functions, and 'set' properties should be commented out or removed. Empty method: '{0}'.
